name: Vegan Breaded Tofu
author: ChrissyintheKitchen
summary: Easy, delicious breaded tofu. A vegan main dish served with brown rice. It's delicious! I use sprouted tofu, it's better for the digestion!
ingredients: ¼ cup vegan mayonnaise (such as Follow Your Heart® Veganaise®)
¼ cup bread crumbs, or as needed
1 (12 ounce) package tofu, sliced into 1/2-inch pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Coat the inside of a 9x13-inch baking dish with olive oil
Stir mayonnaise and water together in a bowl
Place bread crumbs in a separate bowl
Dip tofu slices in the mayonnaise mixture; press tofu into the bread crumbs until fully coated
Place coated tofu in the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until tofu is fully cooked and breading is browned, about 45 minutes
